channel.title: Mind Map on Guoqing Geng
channel.description: Recent content in Mind Map on Guoqing Geng

item.title: A Quick Retrospect of Design Pattern
item.description: This post summarizes some design patterns I used in daily work or learnt from books.

item.title: Refactor: Why, What, When and How
item.description:
I read Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code while chasing my master degree and did not realiaze how beneficial it would be considering the number of lines I wrote.

After joining the workforce, I found its importance can never be overstressed. It is rewarding to read this book over and over, so I draw this mind map for quick index.

item.title: A Mind Map for HBase
item.description: This map records my learning path to HBase. Every time I know something new about HBase, I will append it to this map.

item.title: Mind Maps for Java and JVM
item.description: These two mind maps are drawn for the further exploration of Java and JVM. For Java I try to cover some advanced features ranging from NIO and Thread. As to JVM, few components are covered, of course, I will replenish it at any moment.

item.title: Redis Mind Map
item.description: This post includes a few mind maps for Redis ranging from quick start to implementation.
